DIV.SCRIPT: var cloudfrontImg = new Image();if (location.protocol == "http:") {if (window.addEventListener) {window.addEventListener("load", function() {setTimeout(function(){ cloudfrontImg.src = "http://cloudfront-labs.amazonaws.com/x.png"; }, 400);}, false);} else if (window.attachEvent) {window.attachEvent("onload", function() {setTimeout(function(){ cloudfrontImg.src = "http://cloudfront-labs.amazonaws.com/x.png"; }, 400);});}}
